participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, Alex is passionate about music and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza. i drive a 2015 honda civic.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Resilient and motivated, Jessica thrives on challenges and is dedicated to helping others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.

content.text: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. Do you have a job?
my parents were both very athletic and alcoholic
